SELECT mno,title,director,actor,poster,regdate,story,genre,category_no,score,grade,num FROM (SELECT mno,title,director,actor,poster,regdate,story,genre,category_no,score,grade,rownum as num FROM movie ORDER BY regdate)
AND REGEXP_LIKE(genre,#{movieGenre})
AND REGEXP_LIKE(title,#{text})
AND REGEXP_LIKE(actor,#{text})
AND REGEXP_LIKE(director,#{text})
AND category_no = 2
AND category_no = 3
ORDER BY num
Select * From movie Where category_no=2 And mno Between 1 And 10

SELECT DISTINCT mno, title, director, actor, poster, regdate,genre,grade,story,category_no,score,theater_no FROM movie WHERE REGEXP_LIKE(genre,(SELECT movie_genre FROM movie_genre WHERE movie_no = #{genre))

SELECT DISTINCT mno, title, director, actor, poster, regdate,genre,grade,story,category_no,score,theater_no FROM movie WHERE REGEXP_LIKE(genre,(SELECT movie_genre FROM movie_genre WHERE movie_no = #{first})) OR REGEXP_LIKE(genre,(SELECT movie_genre FROM movie_genre WHERE movie_no = #{last}))

SELECT mno, title, director, actor, poster, regdate, genre, grade, story, category_no, score, theater_no,num FROM (SELECT mno, title, director, actor, poster, regdate, genre, grade, story, category_no, score, theater_no,rownum as num FROM (SELECT mno, title, director, actor, poster, regdate, genre, grade, story, category_no, score, theater_no FROM movie ORDER BY mno ASC )) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
